articles.title: Amid SNAP benefit cuts, these Greater Boston food businesses are here to help
articles.description:
Restaurants, grocery stores, and other food businesses are stepping up during the government shutdown, which has resulted in cuts to millions of people's SNAP benefits.

The post Amid SNAP benefit cuts, these Greater Boston food businesses are here to help appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Greater Boston food businesses are aiding residents affected by SNAP benefit cuts.
Restaurants and grocery stores are providing support during the government shutdown.
Millions of residents face reduced food assistance, impacting local food security.

articles.title: Karen Read shuffles defense attorney lineup in wrongful death suit
articles.description:
Though acquitted of murder and manslaughter, Read still faces a wrongful death lawsuit from the family of her former boyfriend, John O'Keefe.

The post Karen Read shuffles defense attorney lineup in wrongful death suit appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Karen Read updates her defense team in ongoing wrongful death lawsuit against her.
Read was acquitted of murder in 2023 but faces suit from John O'Keefe's family.
Boston residents may see implications for future wrongful death cases and legal proceedings.

articles.title: FuGaKyu in Brookline closes after 27 years in business
articles.description:
The Japanese restaurant served an extensive menu of sushi and other Japanese cuisine.

The post FuGaKyu in Brookline closes after 27 years in business appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: FuGaKyu, a popular Japanese restaurant in Brookline, closed after 27 years of operation.
The restaurant was known for its extensive sushi and Japanese cuisine menu.
Local residents will lose a beloved dining option and cultural staple in the community.

articles.title: Halsey hospitalized with ‘minor medical emergency’ in between Boston shows
articles.description:
"Minor medical emergency but I am A-Okay now and ready to rock tonight!" Halsey shared to her Instagram story Monday afternoon.

The post Halsey hospitalized with ‘minor medical emergency’ in between Boston shows appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Halsey experienced a minor medical emergency on November 4, 2025, in Boston.
Halsey reassured fans via Instagram, stating she is 'A-Okay' for the evening show.
Boston residents can expect the concert to proceed as planned, ensuring local entertainment continues.

articles.title: 18-year-old killed in Belmont moped crash
articles.description:
Belmont police saw the moped driving erratically and on the wrong side the road and attempted to pull the driver over, authorities said.

The post 18-year-old killed in Belmont moped crash appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: An 18-year-old was killed in a moped crash in Belmont on November 4.
Belmont police attempted to stop the moped for erratic driving before the crash.
The incident raises concerns about road safety and moped regulations in the area.

articles.title: Feds: Nurse replaced liquid oxy with household cleaner
articles.description:
It is unclear if the cleaner was administered to a patient.

The post Feds: Nurse replaced liquid oxy with household cleaner appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Nurse allegedly replaced liquid oxycodone with household cleaner at Boston hospital.
Investigation ongoing; unclear if cleaner was given to any patients.
Incident raises concerns about patient safety and medication integrity in local healthcare.
